

                                                                               
                               Vendor Phone List                               
                          and other miscellaneous info                         
                                Release 96.07.18
                                                                               
                                    Copyright                                  
                                   1990 - 1996                                 
                                  by Dan Kyburz                                
                                                                               
                               ALL RIGHTS RESERVED                             
                                                                               
          This list contains commercial, shareware and miscellaneous           
          bulletin boards, vendor sales support, technical support and         
          fax phone numbers I've found useful as the Senior Analyst/           
          Programmer and Operations Manager for a small DP Service             
          Bureau, Computer Consultant, and later as a Senior Network           
          Support Engineer for a major national distributor of computer        
          hardware and software. Many of these numbers have proven             
          personally valuable. Many too have been compiled from industry       
          publications such as Byte, PC Magazine, PC Week, PC World,           
          InfoWorld, Service News, Lan Times, Lan Technology, Lan, Lan         
          Computing, Unix World, Unix Today, Lotus, Data Base Advisor,         
          Computer Language, Dr Dobbs Journal, Computer Shopper,               
          Communications Week, etc.                                            
                                                                               
          Every effort is made to insure the accuracy of this list.            
          Please feel free to distribute this list.  All I ask is that         
          you not charge for this list, nor modify it in any way, except       
          for personal use. Please distribute the original, unmodified         
          list. Send additions, changes and deletions to, Dan Kyburz,          
          PO Box 1225, Palm Harbor, FL 34682-1225 or leave a message on        
          Tech Data Connection bbs at (813) 538-7090, or send e-mail to        
          dkyburz@techdata.com. You can also FAX changes to 813-532-6011.      
                                                                               
                                                                               
          How to get the current version:                                      
                                                                               
          You many download the current list from the Tech Data Connection     
          bbs at 813-538-7090, or The ProData Exchange at 813-920-8820.        
                                                                               
                                       or                                      
                                                                               
          You may now get this file directly from the author's site at:        
          ftp://ftp.techdata.com/pub/dl001100/                                 
                                                                               
          You may also get this file via FTP courtesy of NetWizards at:        
          ftp://ftp.NetWizards.net/pub/vendlist/                               
                                                                               
          (When downloading the file, the file name has the format of          
           VLyymmdd.ZIP, where yy=year, mm=month and dd=day.)                  
                                                                               
                                                                               
          You may access a fully hypertext (HTML) version of this list         
          courtesy of the Walter Shelby Group, Ltd at:                         
          http://www.tile.net./tile/vendors/index.html
